resources.string: The Library is located at Level 2.
The ping pong table is located at Level 5.
The library has computers for printing
The dungeon carpark can be accessed through the path next to the exit of Level 1 carpark.
The empty space outside dungeon is called secret garden.
IICP does not have double parking.
The snooker table is located at 6th floor.
ISST helps IICP to promote the college.
INTIMA is the student government of IICP.
Design Simulation Lab(DESIM Lab) is located at Level 4
Are you sure you want to do this?
Welcome to IICP Common Knowledge Quiz
